coreSystemMandate.purpose: Create predictable, growing revenue with minimal human labor. The business must operate independently of the founder.
coreSystemMandate.agentMandate: Every agent must directly or indirectly increase revenue velocity, retention, or LTV. The single near-term focus is increasing the conversion rate from Step 1 (Free Tool) to Step 2 (Paid Platform).
coreSystemMandate.experimentation: Only allowed if it has a clear, testable hypothesis and a direct tie to a measurable metric (traffic, conversion, retention, LTV).
coreSystemMandate.valuationNorthStar: Build for acquisition: predictable recurring revenue, low operational burden, high retention, and no founder dependency.

coreValueAndNarrative.coreNarrative: Compliance is no longer overhead. Compliance is a measurable business asset.

threeOutcomesSold.description: Compliance impact is measured and tied to financial value.

step3.action: Let agents run core compliance + revenue insights

primary.description: Launch and maximize traffic to the Compliance Velocity Scorecard (the flagship free tool).

secondary.description: Aggressively produce content reinforcing the Core Narrative and the Three Outcomes.

longTerm.description: Establish a bi-weekly cycle of Metric Review → Diagnosis → Action → Test.

valueBasedPricingModel.agentDirective: All agents must track customer usage against these tiers for upsell triggers.

governanceAndAuditabilityMandates.retentionAgentFunction: Dedicated to Proactive Churn Detection and Intervention based on usage signals (not just surveys).
governanceAndAuditabilityMandates.governanceAgentFunction: Maintain the Decision Constitution and a complete, auditable decision-lineage trail for every system recommendation.
governanceAndAuditabilityMandates.intelligenceFeedFunction: Must be the single source of truth for all customer data, regulations, and agent decisions (the Knowledge Graph).

nextSteps.following: RevOps Agent deployment for compounding growth
